00037         inline void SetCalWavelength(double wavelength) { 
00038                 int ii;
00039                 double wv,in;
00040 
00041                 // Store the wavelength ... 
00042                 calWavelength=wavelength;
00043 
00044                 // Update values in concentration / counts arrays
00045                 for (ii=0; ii<calCount; ii++) {
00046                         wv=wavelength;
00047                         if (CalSpec[ii].getXY(&wv,&in))
00048                         {
00049                                 calRawIntnValues[ii]=in;
00050                                 calIntnValues[ii]=calRawIntnValues[ii]-calRawIntnValues[0];
00051                         }
00052                 }
00053 
00054                 // Recalculate curve fit and repopulate specrum data
00055                 CalcBestFit(true);
00056         }
00057         inline double GetCalWavelength(void) { return calWavelength; }
00058 
00059         bool acquire(int idx, double set_conc, double integration, long average, long boxwidth);

00061                 return acquire(idx, set_conc, calIntegrationTime, calSpectraToAverage, calBoxcarWidth); 
00062         }

00116         inline double bestFitXY(double count,double basecount=0) {
00117                 return bestFitXY(count,basecount,type,calParms);
00118         }
00119 
00122         static inline double bestFitXY(double count,double basecount,int ct,const double *cp) {
00123                 int ii;
00124                 double res=cp[0];
00125                 for (ii=1; ii<ct; ii++)
00126                         res+=cp[ii]*pow((count-basecount),ii);
00127                 return res;
00128         }
00129 
00131         enum FitInfoType {
00132                 FIT_FORMULA  = (unsigned int)0x01,
00133                 FIT_RSQUARED = (unsigned int)0x02,
00134         };
00135 
00137         //
00139         inline CString getFitInfo(unsigned int infotype) {
00140                 return formatFitInfo(infotype,type,calParms,calCount,calRSquare);
00141         }
00142 
00144         //
00149         static inline CString formatFitInfo(unsigned int infotype,int ctype, double *cparm, int cplen, double crsqr) {
00150                 CString tval;
00151                 int ii;
00152 
00153                 // fit function
00154                 if (infotype & FitInfoType::FIT_FORMULA) {
00155                         tval.Format(_T("ppm = "));
00156                         if (cplen >= ctype)
00157                         {
00158                                 for (ii=ctype-1; ii>1; ii--)
00159                                         tval.AppendFormat(_T("%.3g * x^%d + "),cparm[ii],ii);
00160                                 for (          ; ii>0; ii--)
00161                                         tval.AppendFormat(_T("%.3g * x + "),cparm[ii],ii);
00162                                 tval.AppendFormat(_T("%.3g\n"),cparm[0]);
00163                         }
00164                         else 
00165                         {
00166                                 tval.Append(_T(" ..."));
00167                         }
00168 
00169                 }
00170 
00171                 // TODO: rsquared ...
00172                 if (infotype & FitInfoType::FIT_RSQUARED) {
00173                         if (cplen >= ctype)
00174                         {
00175                                 tval.AppendFormat(_T("Rsquared = %.4f\n"),crsqr);
00176                         }
00177                         else 
00178                         {
00179                                 tval.Append(_T("Rsquared = ...\n"));
00180                         }
00181                 }
00182 
00183                 return tval;
00184         }

00221         inline bool getXY(int idx, double *x, double *y) { 
00222                 if ((0 <= idx) && (idx < calCount)) {
00223                         return CalSpec[idx].getXY(x,y);
00224                 }
00225                 return false;
00226         }
